headline: From Bargain To Balancing Act: Merck's Next Test Begins (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Merck & Co. is no longer a deep-value patent cliff trade but a fairly valued defensive compounder. Read why I have downgraded MRK stock to Hold.

headline: Merck: Pipeline Building Despite The Light FY26 Guide, Major Momentum
summary: Merck delivered a strong Q4 double beat, with robust pipeline momentum and a healthy new launch cycle. Read more on the Bullish thesis of MRK stock.
